description: This file defines a class 'ThinkingTools' that extends 'Toolkit' and provides a method 'think' for agents or teams to log their thoughts, acting as a scratchpad for reasoning and verification within a larger AI or agent-based system.

classes.name: ThinkingTools
classes.description: A toolkit class that provides a 'think' method for agents or teams to log thoughts and reasoning steps.

methods.name: think
methods.description: Logs a thought for an agent or team, appending it to their session state and returning the full log of thoughts.
